name: Hydration Hunt (Maki-Tak, Kilreth)
description:
Carefully manage the spread of your roots to ensure that you receive enough water to grow and stay healthy. As you progress, you'll encounter various obstacles such as rocks that can disrupt your water supply.

To direct your roots, use the left and right arrow keys. To diverge and split your roots into 2, press the spacebar. To switch between split roots, press the Ctrl key.

Grow as much as you can before your water runs out!

Created for Global Game Jam 2023. Submission page
